name: NEFOPAM HYDROCHLORIDE
breadcrumbs: 4.7.1 Non-opioid analgesics and compound analgesic preparations
cautions:
Cautions elderly, urinary
retention; interactions: Appendix 1
(nefopam)
side-effects:
Side-effects nausea, nervousness, urinary retention, dry mouth,
lightheadedness; less commonly vomiting, blurred
vision, drowsiness, sweating, insomnia, tachycardia, headache; confusion
and hallucinations also reported; may colour urine
(pink)
doses:
By mouth, initially 60 mg (elderly 30 mg) 3 times daily, adjusted
according to response; usual range 30–90 mg 3 times daily; child not recommended
pregnancy: Pregnancy no information available—avoid unless no safer treatment
